DOC.brief_summary: The aim AUTAX study investigate frequency MACCE patient multivessel disease multiple Taxus stent implantation `` real world '' stenting 30 day , 6 12 month 2 year follow-up . Because multivessel stenting use DES limit due economic consideration , secondary aim enhance experience multivessel stenting drug-eluting stent order improve short- long-term outcome patient severe multiple coronary artery stenosis . The objective study : 1 . To determine frequency MACCE 30-day , 6 12-month 2 year clinical follow-up multivessel intervention drug-eluting stent prospective patient cohort.. 2 . To determine rate in-stent restenosis , target lesion target vessel revascularization ( angiographic measure ) 6 month patient multiple DESs multiple lesion . 3 . To investigate clinical angiographic outcome implantation multiple DESs subgroup patient accompany disease ( diabetes mellitus , renal insufficiency ) know high restenosis late complication rate . 4 . To evaluate potential cost burden attempt strategy complete revascularization multiple DES patient multivessel disease .
DOC.criteria: symptomatic coronary multivessel disease possible percutaneous complete coronary revascularization age > 18 year significant coronary lesion least 2 vessel acute myocardial infarction within 48 hour contraindication clopidogrel , aspirin , heparin taxol pregnancy lack protection pregnancy breastfeed study hemorrhagic diathesis platelet count < 100.000/ml3
